content.body: Here's my email from the service:
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Here's my email from the service:

content.body:
Hello, Daniel. Thank you for the call today and inquiry about our services.
 
As discussed, we understand that you have some ongoing meetings that require realtime services and also need to have the ability to have realtime editing of the live file as it proceeds. Editing/updating of the live text would be done by people on your team and taken directly from the live text stream provided by the captioner. The idea is to write directly into Google Docs, share that file, then provide shared access to the document to allow the editing.
 
Our rate for services is billed at $135/hour with a two-hour minimum. We generally will bill services for the time that is scheduled thereafter and if time does exceed the scheduled time, billing is in .25 hour increments for any time that exceeds the scheduled booking time.
 
We also understand that we are potentially scheduled to provide a test of our services on July 20, 2022, 10:00-12:00 PT. This is not yet confirmed, but we have it noted in our system.
 
If you do wish to proceed with that day and time, please advise and we can finalize other information that is needed to proceed.
 
Thank you, and should you have any other questions, please do let me know. Enjoy the rest of your Wednesday!
 
Duane O’Geil
IR Broadcast Captioning
Remote CART | Classroom Captioning | Closed Captioning
Direct - 403.650.3395
Duane on LinkedIn:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/duaneogeil/
Learn about our services at:
www.broadcastcc.com

Editing/updating of the live text would be done by people on your team and taken directly from the live text stream provided by the captioner. The idea is to write directly into Google Docs, share that file, then provide shared access to the document to allow the editing.
 
Our rate for services is billed at $135/hour with a two-hour minimum. We generally will bill services for the time that is scheduled thereafter and if time does exceed the scheduled time, billing is in .25 hour increments for any time that exceeds the scheduled booking time.
 
We also understand that we are potentially scheduled to provide a test of our services on July 20, 2022, 10:00-12:00 PT. This is not yet confirmed, but we have it noted in our system.
 
If you do wish to proceed with that day and time, please advise and we can finalize other information that is needed to proceed.
 
Thank you, and should you have any other questions, please do let me know. Enjoy the rest of your Wednesday!
